20110105000952.000|20110105000954.000|TR0|opportunity to get the health care 
20110105000954.000|20110105000956.000|TR0|coverage that they need.  We need to make 
20110105000956.000|20110105000958.000|TR0|sure that patients and doctors are in the 
20110105000958.000|20110105001000.000|TR0|driver's seat. Repealing health care 
20110105001000.000|20110105001002.000|TR0|reform puts insurance companies back in 
20110105001002.000|20110105001004.000|TR0|the driver's seat, yanks health care

20110105001904.000|20110105001906.000|TR0|provisions kicked in last year.

20110105001910.000|20110105001912.000|TR0|the first of the year including medication 
20110105001912.000|20110105001914.000|TR0|coverage for those in the so-called 
20110105001914.000|20110105001916.000|TR0|Medicaid "donut hole", free preventive 
20110105001916.000|20110105001919.000|TR0|services for seniors, improved care for 
20110105001919.000|20110105001921.000|TR0|seniors after hospital stays and insurance 
20110105001921.000|20110105001923.000|TR0|companies must now spend 85 percent of the 
20110105001923.000|20110105001925.000|TR0|premium money they take in on health care. 
20110105001925.000|20110105001927.000|TR0| Here's some of what kicks in three years 
20110105001927.000|20110105001929.000|TR0|from now, a mandate that most Americans 
20110105001929.000|20110105001931.000|TR0|get health insurance.
20110105001931.000|20110105001933.000|TR0|
20110105001933.000|20110105001935.000|TR0|The new insurance exchanges, they're 
20110105001935.000|20110105001937.000|TR0|designed to boost competition, middle 
20110105001937.000|20110105001939.000|TR0|class tax credits for health care, annual 
20110105001939.000|20110105001942.000|TR0|insurance caps and no denials due to 
20110105001942.000|20110105001944.000|TR0|preexisting conditions.  So is the health
